title: MFly Presentation
description: MFly presents its competition and past aircraft to teams in the Ford Robotics Building atrium.

title: Field Reveal
description: Teams examine the new competition field for Freight Frenzy.

title: Drone Presentation
description: FAMNM Volunteer coordinator, Jiawei Chen, showcases current drone projects at the new Ford Robotics Building.

title: Digit, the Humanoid
description: In the Ford Robotics Building, Oluwami showcases Digit, a humanoid robot from Agility Robotics.

title: Pre-Reveal Activities
description: Teams play Kahoot and view FAMNM's 2019 FRC Ri3D robot at the Stamps Auditorium prior to the game reveal.
